languages.text: "Как старший родственник и прямой наследник я мог посягнуть на трон Теодоры — и посягнул. Я собирался убить ее и объявить поиски наследника, а пока они идут, войти в Камеру Патента и объявить титул Вольного Торговца своим по праву крови. Теодора раскрыла мой заговор, казнила всех, кто помогал мне, а самого отдала техножрецам".

"As Theodora's senior relative and direct heir, I could lay claim to her throne — and I did. I intended to kill her and declare a search for her successor, and while it went on, to enter the Warrant Chamber and assume the Rogue Trader's title by right of blood. Theodora exposed my plan, executed anyone who had taken part in the conspiracy, and turned me over to her Tech-Priests."
languages.original_text: "Как старший родственник и прямой наследник я мог посягнуть на трон Теодоры — и посягнул. Я собирался убить ее и объявить поиски наследника, а пока они идут, войти в Камеру Патента и объявить титул Вольного Торговца своим по праву крови. Теодора раскрыла мой заговор, казнила всех, кто помогал мне, а самого отдала техножрецам".

I intended to kill her and declare a search for her heir, and while it went on, to enter the Warrant Chamber and assume the Rogue Trader's title by right of blood. Theodora exposed my plan, executed anyone who had taken part in the conspiracy, and turned me over to her Tech-Priests."

languages.text: «Como pariente mayor de Theodora y heredero directo, podía reclamar su trono, y así lo hice. Pretendía matarla, declarar una búsqueda de sucesor y, mientras tanto, entrar en la sala de la Patente y hacerme con el título de Comerciante Independiente por derecho de sangre. Theodora reveló mi plan, ejecutó a todos cuantos participaron en la conspiración y a mí me entregó a los tecnosacerdotes».
languages.original_text: "As Theodora's senior relative and direct heir, I could lay claim to her throne — and I did. I intended to kill her and declare a search for her successor, and while it went on, to enter the Warrant Chamber and assume the Rogue Trader's title by right of blood. Theodora exposed my plan, executed anyone who had taken part in the conspiracy, and turned me over to her Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: «Como pariente mayor de Theodora y heredero directo, podía reclamar su trono, y así lo hice. Pretendía matarla, declarar una búsqueda de sucesor y, mientras tanto, entrar en la sala de la Patente y hacerme con el título de Comerciante Independiente por derecho de sangre. Theodora reveló mi plan, ejecutó a todos cuantos participaron en la conspiración y a mí me entregó a los tecnosacerdotes».

languages.text: “我是西奥多拉的哥哥，王朝的直属继承人，我可以宣布她的王位属于我，当初我也确实是这么做的。我打算杀掉她，表面上宣布寻找能继承她王位的人，暗地里进入授状大厅，凭借我自己的血脉，继承行商浪人的头衔。但西奥多拉发现了我的计划，她处决了所有参与政变的成员，把我交给了她的技术神甫。”
languages.original_text: "As Theodora's senior relative and direct heir, I could lay claim to her throne — and I did. I intended to kill her and declare a search for her successor, and while it went on, to enter the Warrant Chamber and assume the Rogue Trader's title by right of blood. Theodora exposed my plan, executed anyone who had taken part in the conspiracy, and turned me over to her Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: “我是西奥多拉的哥哥，王朝的直属继承人，我可以宣布她的王位属于我，当初我也确实是这么做的。我打算杀掉她，表面上宣布寻找能继承她王位的人，暗地里进入授状大厅，凭借我自己的血脉，继承行商浪人的头衔。但西奥多拉发现了我的计划，她处决了所有参与政变的成员，把我交给了她的技术神甫。”

languages.text: 「シオドーラの年上の親族として、そして直系の継承者として、彼女に王位に要求したかもしれないし、実際に要求した。私は彼女を殺そうともくろみ、彼女の後継者を探すことを宣言するつもりだった。そうしている間に、令状部屋に入り、血の権利によってローグトレーダーの職位に就こうとした。シオドーラは私の計画を曝露し、謀反に関与した者を処刑し、私の身柄を技術司祭に引き渡した」
languages.original_text: "As Theodora's senior relative and direct heir, I could lay claim to her throne — and I did. I intended to kill her and declare a search for her successor, and while it went on, to enter the Warrant Chamber and assume the Rogue Trader's title by right of blood. Theodora exposed my plan, executed anyone who had taken part in the conspiracy, and turned me over to her Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラの年上の親族として、そして直系の継承者として、彼女に王位に要求したかもしれないし、実際に要求した。私は彼女を殺そうともくろみ、彼女の後継者を探すことを宣言するつもりだった。そうしている間に、令状部屋に入り、血の権利によってローグトレーダーの職位に就こうとした。シオドーラは私の計画を曝露し、謀反に関与した者を処刑し、私の身柄を技術司祭に引き渡した」

languages.text: "Als älterer Bruder und direkter Erbe konnte ich Anspruch auf ihren Thron erheben ... und das tat ich. Ich wollte sie töten und mich während der Suche nach einem Nachfolger in der Handelskammer unter Berufung auf mein Blutrecht zum Freihändler erklären. Theodora erfuhr von meinem Plan, ließ alle an der Verschwörung beteiligten Personen hinrichten und übergab mich den Techpriestern."
languages.original_text: "As Theodora's senior relative and direct heir, I could lay claim to her throne — and I did. I intended to kill her and declare a search for her successor, and while it went on, to enter the Warrant Chamber and assume the Rogue Trader's title by right of blood. Theodora exposed my plan, executed anyone who had taken part in the conspiracy, and turned me over to her Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: "Als älterer Bruder und direkter Erbe konnte ich Anspruch auf ihren Thron erheben ... und das tat ich. Ich wollte sie töten und mich während der Suche nach einem Nachfolger in der Handelskammer unter Berufung auf mein Blutrecht zum Freihändler erklären. Theodora erfuhr von meinem Plan, ließ alle an der Verschwörung beteiligten Personen hinrichten und übergab mich den Techpriestern."

languages.text: « En tant que frère aîné de Théodora et héritier direct de la dynastie, j'étais en droit de revendiquer le trône... et je ne m'en suis pas privé. J'avais l'intention de la tuer avant de faire mine de rechercher son successeur. Le temps que l'enquête suive son cours, j'en aurais profité pour accéder à la salle de la lettre de marque et endosser le titre de libre-marchand en vertu du droit du sang. Quand Théodora a eu vent de mon projet, elle a exécuté l'ensemble de mes complices et m'a livré aux bons soins de ses technoprêtres. »
languages.original_text: "As Theodora's senior relative and direct heir, I could lay claim to her throne — and I did. I intended to kill her and declare a search for her successor, and while it went on, to enter the Warrant Chamber and assume the Rogue Trader's title by right of blood. Theodora exposed my plan, executed anyone who had taken part in the conspiracy, and turned me over to her Tech-Priests."

traits.locale_text: « En tant que frère aîné de Théodora et héritier direct de la dynastie, j'étais en droit de revendiquer le trône... et je ne m'en suis pas privé. J'avais l'intention de la tuer avant de faire mine de rechercher son successeur. Le temps que l'enquête suive son cours, j'en aurais profité pour accéder à la salle de la lettre de marque et endosser le titre de libre-marchand en vertu du droit du sang. Quand Théodora a eu vent de mon projet, elle a exécuté l'ensemble de mes complices et m'a livré aux bons soins de ses technoprêtres. »

languages.text: "Theodora'nın büyüğü ve doğrudan vârisi olarak tahtında hak iddia edebilirdim. Ettim de. Onu öldürmeyi ve yerine geçecek olanı aramaya koyulduğumu duyurmaya niyetliydim. Bu sırada Ruhsatname Odası'na girip Hür Tacirlik makamını kandan doğan hakkımla devralmayı planlıyordum. Theodora planımı öğrendi. Komploya dâhil olan herkesi idam edip beni de Tekno Rahiplere verdi."
languages.original_text: "As Theodora's senior relative and direct heir, I could lay claim to her throne — and I did. I intended to kill her and declare a search for her successor, and while it went on, to enter the Warrant Chamber and assume the Rogue Trader's title by right of blood. Theodora exposed my plan, executed anyone who had taken part in the conspiracy, and turned me over to her Tech-Priests."
